sentences.sContent: Heathcliff had opened the trinket and cast out its contents, replacing them by a black lock of his own.
sentences.sContent_eng: Heathcliff had opened the trinket and cast out its contents, replacing them by a black lock of his own.
sentences.sCn: 希刺克厉夫把这小装饰品打开了，把里面的东西扔出来，装进他自己的一绺黑发。

synos.tran: 小装饰品；不值钱的小玩意儿

trans.tranCn: 小装饰品； 不值钱的珠宝
